page.title: 01HEATH & REACH AND POTSGROVE
page.content:
Crossed from North West to South East by the busy A5 road (The London to Chester Roman Road Watling Street), the survey square is a mixture of thick woodland and large open fields on gentle hillsides.
The village of{Heath & Reach}and the tiny hamlet of{Potsgrove}are the only areas of population.
Suprisingly well hidden from casual glance, the area contains numerous {sand quarries}ranging from small sandpits to major holes in the ground. The Sand Industry dominates the area.
The Greensands belt, running from South West to North East provides soil conditions supporting first class agriculture to thin poor soil for acidic heathland plants.
